name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

name: pasta all'arrabbiata
instructions: Boil the spaghetti or pasta. warm up the mix of galic, oil, a small ammount of salt and the tomato source and after it boil up cut the gas and mix with the pasta/spagetti and serve.
